newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Argentina's Siderar cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Argentina's Siderar cut.

text.p: -- Bankers Trust analyst Karen Miller said she had reduced her rating for Argentine utility Siderar S.A.I.C to market perfrom from buy.

-- The cut was "based on the fact that the shares have moved close to our price target of 3.25 pesos," she wrote in an analysis. "The shares have appreciated 38 percent since we initiated coverage on Aug 23, 1996."
-- She added, "Looking ahead, continued focus on higher value-added products, debt reduction and extension of maturities should enhance earnings momentum."
-- The company's shares closed at 3.105 on Wednesday in Buenos Aires.
